state.label: Meredith Grey
state.desc: Meredith is the series' protagonist and was introduced as a surgical intern at the fictional Seattle Grace Hospital. She eventually obtains the position of a surgical resident, and later, the position of an attending surgeon..

state.label: Derek Shepherd
state.desc: Derek Shepherd was a renowned neurosurgeon, former Head of Neurosurgery, and board director at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital. He was married to Meredith Grey

state.label: Richard Webber
state.desc: He is the Chief of Surgery at both Seattle Grace Hospital and Seattle Grace Mercy West Hospital.
